globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self' https://*.hubspot.com https://*.hsforms.com https://*.hs-scripts.com; img-src 'self' data: https: https://*.hubspot.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://*.hubspot.com https://*.hs-scripts.com https://*.hsforms.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; frame-src 'self' https://*.hubspot.com https://*.hsforms.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.hubspot.com https://*.hsforms.com
